last_episode_to_air.name: Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: The family rallies together to sneak Cecile back into the nursing home, but the fun is interrupted by unexpected news.

name: Amber Brown
overview: Between her parents’ divorce and best friend moving away, Amber Brown is having a tough time. But her art, video diary, and new friend Brandi provide outlets for Amber to express her feelings and find gratitude in the love that surrounds her.
tagline: Growing up is a work of art.

episodes.name: I, Amber Brown
episodes.overview: Starting middle school without her best friend, Justin, makes Amber all the more grateful for new friend and neighbor Brandi.

episodes.name: What They Don’t Know
episodes.overview: Amber and Brandi find a diamond ring, which leads Amber to believe her mom is about to do something Amber’s not quite ready for.

episodes.name: No Place Like Two Homes
episodes.overview: Amber sets aside her fears and auditions for the school play, while her dad moves into a new apartment.

episodes.name: On a Role
episodes.overview: It’s the night of the play and Amber’s nervous. She hopes her dad, who’s stuck in traffic, makes it in time to see her debut.

episodes.name: Sound Advice
episodes.overview: Amber wants to get her ears pierced—just like Brandi—so she enlists the help of Aunt Pam to try persuading her mom.

episodes.name: Schooled Dance
episodes.overview: As the girls get ready for their first school dance, Amber feels bad about disobeying her mom and wants to come clean.

episodes.name: Comes in Waves
episodes.overview: When Amber’s new math tutor turns out to be an old crush of her dad’s, she and Brandi form a plan so that she’ll never need a tutor again.

episodes.name: Hollywood Beginning
episodes.overview: Amber’s house is overrun by a film crew, which has the surprising effect of bringing the family together, much to Amber’s delight.

episodes.name: Love Is Here to Stay
episodes.overview: While volunteering at a nursing home, Amber befriends a resident and bends the facility’s rules in the spirit of love and friendship.

episodes.name: Life
episodes.overview: The family rallies together to sneak Cecile back into the nursing home, but the fun is interrupted by unexpected news.
